summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 318 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1898 m), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), outside temperature (up 2.4°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and little or no wind. Rain showers likely, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dark. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
